title: Honor level 0 - 1
body: So a while back ago I was penalized and became honor level 0, not complaining or anything I know what I did and I deserved it. However, it's been a while and I haven't been toxic or afking at all; I've been getting constant honors and have been honoring others. I was just wondering how long it takes to climb out of Honor level 0 to 1. Cheers

replies.body: took me like 3 months then and altogether took 9 months to get to lvl 2 it was torture

forever. dont type AT ALL and you'll unlock it. 

if you type once you've restarted

It took me roughly 120 games to go from Honor 0 (locked) to Honor 0, Level 3.

But it took like almost 70 games to go from Honor 0, level 3 to Honor 1, Level 0. No idea why as my behaviour didn't change.

Apparently reports cancel out your honor. I'm not sure if they still do even if the reports are bogus, but yeah.
